DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide opportunity patient malignancies bone marrow failure state lack suitable sibling donor undergo allogeneic hematopoietic progenitor cell transplantation use cell unrelated individual cord blood registry .
DOC.criteria: > 18 year Age < 70 year ECOG performance status 0 , 1 2 Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction > 30 % Creatinine clearance > 40ml/min Transaminases < 2X normal Total bilirubin < 2X normal HIV seronegativity Weight < 70kg cord blood transplantation Ability cover cost transplant , necessary medication , transportation/housing . Caregiver must available outpatient Greater one antigen mismatch HLAA , B , C DR plus one allele mismatch HLAA , B , C DR
